messages.ssml: <speak>Do #pronouns.pronoun1 have any of the following conditions? Neurological conditions that weaken ability to cough (cerebral palsy, seizure disorders, stroke, intellectual disability, moderate to severe developmental delay, muscular dystrophy, or spinal cord injury). Weakened immune system (receiving cancer treatment, received an organ or bone marrow transplant, high doses of oral steroids or other immunosuppressant medications, HIV or AIDS). Chronic kidney disease undergoing dialysis. Liver disease. Severe obesity (body mass index <say-as interpret-as="characters">BMI</say-as> of 40 or higher). Pregnancy (in the last two weeks or currently).</speak>

text: Neurological conditions that weaken ability to cough (cerebral palsy, seizure disorders, stroke, intellectual disability, moderate to severe developmental delay, muscular dystrophy, or spinal cord injury)
Weakened immune system (receiving cancer treatment, received an organ or bone marrow transplant, high doses of oral steroids or other immunosuppressant medications, HIV or AIDS)
Severe obesity (body mass index [BMI] of 40 or higher)
Pregnancy (in the last two weeks or currently)
richContent.title: Do #pronouns.pronoun1 have any of the following conditions?
